    script = tec_type_hint
    scripted_trigger = $trigger$
    bool = $default$
}

    script = conditional/tec_number
    value = @tec_giga_patch_addon_present
    equal = 1
    code = "
        $trigger$_giga_patch = {
            optimize_memory
            always = $default$
        }
    "
}
